pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:6.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc92:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
